name: Extract DMN/ECN
description: Extract Default Mode Network and Executive Control Network regions from ROI time series

outputs.name: DMN/ECN Time Series
outputs.description: Filtered time series containing only DMN (58) and ECN (48) regions

parameters.name: DMN Indices
parameters.description: Indices of DMN regions (auto-detected from Schaefer atlas)

parameters.name: ECN Indices
parameters.description: Indices of ECN regions (auto-detected from Schaefer atlas)
